title: What are the differences and similarities between 21st and pre-colonial literature? - Quora

response.answer_text: pre-colonial pop literature was for the few who could read, and had a lot of adventure stories set in mythic or legendary lands. 21st pop involves 20 something children kidnapped in a foreign land and discovering their hidden superpowers. also, there’s some older adult stuff about adventures with some exotic and sexy person from some mythic land.
